about.p-1:
Hello all! My name is Sergey Didenko.
I am a software developer.
about.p-2:
I worked with many clients and teams, saw a lot of projects and issues.
Basically, I like working with backend, like Java Spring.
But I also had a lot of experience working with a frontend, such as JS, AngularJS, Angular/TypeScript.
about.p-3: Now I am following the Eclipse Foundation and their JakartaEE. I think with "New Java Enterprise" we will get a future!

8.title: College management information system (SIMC)
8.description:
Web platform for the College of Engineering in the Republic of Moldova.
The information system is designed to
automate basic college management processes,
such as admission to studies, promotion,
internships for students, workflow automation.
8.languages: Java, TypeScript, HTML, SCSS, JSON, MySql.
8.technologies: Angular, Webpack, Spring REST, Spring JPA, Security.

7.title: ESPN Fantasy Soccer
7.description:
This is one of the largest online betting platforms in the world,
used by 60% of the leading operators, integrated with over 40 of the world’s most renowned games’ developers.
The main feature is team building of
real international players and games against family and friends.
Team points are awarded for the actual achievements of these players.

In collaboration with Code Factory Group SRL.
7.languages: Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, JSON, MySql.
7.technologies: Spring MVC, Struts, JSP, JPA, Hibernate, REST, SOAP, MyBatis,Jenkins and else.

6.title: Platform for Dual Education (DVP)
6.description:
This is a web platform for the Chamber of Commerce of the Republic of Moldova.
The dual education platform is an information system designed to systematize data on educational institutions,
graduates, students who are already studying the system of dual education, technical specialties and list of certified specialists,
data on private companies (offering jobs in technical fields, internships and training for students)
and automation of work processes.

In collaboration with Valnet-Service SRL.
6.languages: Java, TypeScript, HTML, SCSS, JSON, MySql.
6.technologies: Angular, Webpack, Spring REST, Spring JPA, Security.

5.title: EZ Parking
5.description:
This is an Android application + API, which can predict
what kind of public parking space will be available, and point it to drivers who want to park.
The user can view, edit and check parking spaces and rules, for example: opening hours, parking days, etc.
5.technologies: Spring REST, Spring JPA, Spring Security.

4.title: Fashion Dealer
4.description:
This is B2B e-commerce platform from Italy.
The main work was to connect new APIs for managing suppliers and sales,
updating and modifying algorithms, new modules for implementing new ideas.

3.title: Server for children game
3.description:
API for educational games for children,
the main function of storing data and assets (pictures, text, voice, etc.)
3.technologies: Spring REST, Spring JPA, Spring Security.

2.title: Near me Friends
2.description:
This is an Android application + API for easy communication with friends.
Includes features such as Facebook, Telegram and Google authorization,
viewing your closest friends on a map, making a route to them,
chatting, visiting nearby places (like on Facebook) and more.
2.technologies: Spring REST, Spring JPA, Spring Security.

1.title: SPN GPS Tracker
1.description:
This is a web platform and an android application for a Moldovan client,
providing tools for transport logistics, such as
viewing routes, current position, speed,
managing zones and notifications about entering or leaving them, chat for communication.
1.languages: Java, Android, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, JSON, XML, MySql.
1.technologies: AngularJS, Spring REST, Spring JPA, Spring Security.
